display_long_description:
Real Racer XR by KOBOTIX takes RC car racing to the next level, delivering an unmatched, immersive driving experience that bridges the gap between the virtual and physical worlds. 

[ NOTE: This app is designed to be used in conjunction with the KOBOTIX Real Racer product. Please see here for further information: https://www.kobotix.com/get-realracer ]

Connect this app to your Real Racer and step into the cockpit of your RC car in an exhilarating virtual reality environment. Enjoy low latency FPV video beamed to the virtual windscreen and control your Real Racer in the physical world with the virtual steering wheel, making you feel like you’re truly sitting in the driver’s seat!

Features include:

- Immersive virtual cockpit with detailed controls and customizable colors
- Low latency FPV video beamed from the car to the app
- Virtual steering wheel for controlling your car in the physical world
- Instrument panel including tachometer, battery and signal indicators
- Simulated engine sounds for enhanced realism
- Optional use of the pistol grip controller included with Real Racer for traditional RC car control
